about_me.text1: Hello, I´m Barbora Lambeinova. What I love about coding is the creativity of solutions and almost endless possibilities.
about_me.text2: Let´s connect and create something amazing together!

competencen.text: I usedd a variety of front-end technologies. You can take a look on the ready projects in the next section.

work.text: Explore the selection of my work here - interact with the projects to see my skills in action.
work.description: Pokedex. A little project to see my work with APIs.

reviews.h2: What my colleagues say about me:

contact.text2: If I catch your attention, don´t hesitate to contact me with this formular. I would be happy to hear from you!
